<a id="VBoxContainer"></a>

# VBoxContainer

**Inherits:** [BoxContainer](BoxContainer.md) **\<** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [ColorPicker](ColorPicker.md), [FileSystemDock](FileSystemDock.md), [ScriptEditorBase](ScriptEditorBase.md)

A container that arranges its child controls vertically.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A variant of [BoxContainer](BoxContainer.md) that can only arrange its child controls vertically. Child controls are rearranged automatically when their minimum size changes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->
